thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 257 2
thread.title: Talesnat

author: Talesnat
title: Talesnat
text:
Fiew days after ordering, I have been informed that the item was out of stock. The customer service gave me a predicted restocked date and asked me if I wanted to maintain or to cancel my order. I kept my order and received the article yesterday. Time between order and delivery : 4 weeks.
To resume, exept the inconvenience of the delay, it was a pleasure to deal with this online store, specially as you have direct and reactive contact with the customer service team. Thanks a lot for your assistance.
I am located in Switzerland
.*´¨ )
